alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 1:20AM CDT until March 31 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM EDT/215 AM CDT/ FOR EASTERN SEQUATCHIE...SOUTHWESTERN BLEDSOE AND NORTH CENTRAL HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 219 AM EDT/119 AM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dunlap, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Dunlap, Pikeville, Soddy-Daisy, Flat Top Mountain, Palio, North Chickamauga Creek Gorge, Mowbray Mountain, Brayton, Old Cumberland and Fall Creek Falls State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
